name: Please die (don't)
description:
Fun fact: despite the game jam being 10 days long, I didn't start my project until the second last day, since I was swamped with school work and didn't have an idea for the first 8 days. Feels good to break my streak of giving up on projects half way through! With that out of the way, I have created a couch party style game where you, the Grim Reaper, need to kill as many people as possible with landmines within a minute, while your friend does their best to keep everyone alive. While you can technically play this game yourself, it's recommended to do it with a friend. 

Controls:

Grim Reaper - WASD to move and Space to place landmines

Other Player - Left Mouse Button to pick up people

Background art and particles created with assets from https://kenney.nl/

PS. I didn't get the chance to try playing with another person, so if you do, let me know if you had fun
